Package com.mapquest.android.maps

Interface Summary
ItemizedOverlay.OnFocusChangeListener A callback interface to notify of newly focused item.
MapView.MapViewEventListener MapViewEventListeners are a simple way to detect changes in the map state in your code.
Overlay.OverlayTapListener Listener used to notify on OverlayTapEvents, use this listener if you only care if an Overlay is tapped.
Overlay.OverlayTouchEventListener Listener used to notify on OverlayTouchEvents, use this listener if you care about the actual coordinates where the Overlay was touched
Overlay.OverlayTrackballEventListener Listener used to notify on Trackball events
Overlay.Snappable When a touch event causes a zoom in and this interface is implemented in your overlay this onSnapToItem will be called to give the overlay a chance to reposition the point that is getting zoomed into.
Projection Projection class translates pixel coordinates on the screen to latitude and longitude degrees on earth's surface and vice versa.
RouteManager.RouteCallback Used to get notifications of RouteManager events
 

Class Summary
AnnotationView AnnotationView
BoundingBox Simple rectangle object based on geo-coordinates Useful for determining geographical intersections, for example, determining whether a GeoPoint is within a geographical rectangle by using the static methods BoundingBox.contains(GeoPoint)
CircleOverlay A simple Overlay for displaying a circle on the map.
Configuration This class is used to configure and exercise some of the lesser used options available in the SDK, if you would like to change or use things in this class use the MapView.getConfiguration method in order to get reference to it.
DefaultItemizedOverlay A simple, default concrete class extending ItemizedOverlay backed by a List.
DrawableOverlay An utility class to overlay a drawable resource.
EllipseOverlay A simple Overlay for displaying an ellipse on the map.
GeoPoint An immutable class containing integer values of latitude and longitude in microdegrees,
ItemizedOverlay<Item extends OverlayItem> ItemizedOverlay is a base overlay used to group OverlayItems.
LineOverlay LineOverlay is an extension of a map Overlay intended for drawing a line on a MapView

The line overlay can be used to draw a route ribbon, as used in the RouteManager class
MapActivity This is the foundation class for displaying a map in your application.
MapController An helper class to control map actions like panning, zooming and map animations.
MapView A View class which displays MapQuest maps based on the licensed data or OpenStreetMap data.
MapView.LayoutParams Sets the layout options for child views.
MyLocationOverlay MyLocationOverlay is an overlay class for showing a user's physical location on a map (using MyLocationOverlay.enableMyLocation()).
Overlay Overlay is the base class used in drawing overlays on a map.
OverlayItem This class represents an item added to the map as part of an ItemizedOverlay.
PolygonOverlay PolygonOverlay is an extension of a map Overlay intended for drawing a polygon on a MapView
RectangleOverlay A simple Overlay for displaying a rectangle on the map.
RotatableIconOverlay An Overlay that display a Drawable resource on the map at a point and can be rotated.
RouteManager The RouteManager is a wrapper around Directions Service used to add routes to a mapView including both the route ribbon and the route locations and generate itineraries.
Notes:
Locations passed in must be in one of the formats the directions service expects.
RouteResponse This class is an object representation of a directions service response see Directions Service Documentation for more information.
ServiceResponse Wrapper around general web service response format see Status Code Documenation for more information regarding codes and messages.
TrackballGestureDetector Utility to analyze the trackball events
 

Enum Summary
MapView.ReticleDrawMode An enum to specify the drawing mode of the reticle.
